text: ew: Gene Review: GTP Cyclohydrolase 1-Deficient Dopa-Responsive Dystonia  - Genetic Testing Registry: Dystonia 5, Dopa-responsive type  - Genetic Testing Registry: Segawa syndrome, autosomal recessive  - Genetic Testing Registry: Sepiapterin reductase deficiency   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation  - Genetic Counseling   - Palliative Care",GHR,dopa-r
